quotes.quote: There are always new, grander challenges to confront, and a true winner will embrace each one.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: I think it's really important to have a vision of teamwork, team play, and unselfishness.
quotes.author: Chris Mullin

quotes.quote: When you want to throw the towel in, there is someone you may not even realize that is rooting for you in the stands.
The harder you work, the harder it is to lose.
Success starts with the mindset that you can do it. You must believe that you can, despite what adversity may come your way.
Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.quote: Talent makes you good. Hustle makes you great.
Win or lose you will never regret working hard, making sacrifices, being disciplined or focusing too much. Success is measured by what we have done to prepare for competition.
quotes.author: John Smith

quotes.quote: You've got to take the initiative and play your game. In a decisive set, confidence is the difference.
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.quote: The greatest rewards are often the result of the greatest challenges.
It's true: teamwork makes the dream work.
quotes.author: Natalya Neidhart

quotes.quote: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Success is not achieved by winning all the time. Real success comes when we rise after we fall.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. Until your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: Tim Duncan

quotes.quote: Unity is strength... When there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.quote: Make your competitive juices overcome your excuses.
It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get back up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Continue to push yourself, the finish line is right there.
Don't be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.quote: The world is moving so fast these days that the man who says it can't be done is generally interrupted by someone doing it.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: You can't win tomorrow's game by thinking about yesterday's loss.
Find the voice inside of you that wants to see you win.
Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: You don't have to be the best to win, but you do have to be the most disciplined.
We try to stress the little things because little things lead to big things.
quotes.author: Steve Alford

quotes.quote: To be a great champion you must believe you are the best. If you're not, pretend you are.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Right now, you hear about teamwork, and it's defined as 50-50, and that is a falsehood. There's no such thing as 50-50. You know, you do whatever you have to do as part of the team.
quotes.author: Chuck Noll

quotes.quote: Competing at the highest level is not about winning. It's about preparation, courage, understanding and nurturing your people, and heart. Winning is the result.
quotes.author: Joe Torre

quotes.quote: A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skills of others.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: On or off the field, practice and teamwork are the key to success.
quotes.author: Malcolm Jenkins

quotes.quote: Show me a guy who's afraid to look bad, and I'll show you a guy you can beat every time.
quotes.author: Lou Brock

quotes.quote: Don't fear failure. â€” Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: If you are ready to play, you have to give everything. No excuses.
Winning is something that builds physically and mentally every day that you train and every night that you dream.
quotes.author: Emmitt Smith

quotes.quote: There is someone, somewhere waiting for you to motivate them to be great. So go and be great; inspire!
The nice thing about teamwork is that you always have others on your side.
Believe in yourself more than you believe in your excuses.
Grind now, so you can play later.

As a former NCAA basketball player, many of the skills I now rely on as a leader took root on the basketball court: teamwork, integrity, and resilience are just some of the traits I've carried over into my professional game.
quotes.author: Cathy Engelbert

quotes.quote: Do it with your whole heart.
Winning takes precedence over all. There's no gray area. No almosts.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: I'm a true believer in the strength of teamwork, in the power of dreams, and in the absolute necessity of a support structure.
quotes.author: Julie Payette

quotes.quote: The best thing you can do for yourself is to never give up.
If you're not just a little bit nervous before a match, you probably don't have the expectations of yourself that you should have.
Be legendary.
Teamwork requires some sacrifice up front; people who work as a team have to put the collective needs of the group ahead of their individual interests.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: I never lose. I'm either winning or learning.
One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: You are never really playing an opponent. You are playing yourself, your own highest standards, and when you reach your limits, that is real joy.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything, but wanting it is.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Victory is paid for in sweat, courage and preparation.
Self-discipline is what keeps you going to the finish line.
There will be obstacles. There will be doubters. There will be mistakes. But with hard work, there are no limits.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: Don't stress. Do your best. Forget the rest.
